name: Kingyo Matsuri
description:
Inspired by Kingyo Sukui (goldfish scooping), a popular Japanese Matsuri game! Scoop up fish by clicking on them when they're not actively swimming. Go for a high score!

CREDITS:

Programming: Karr Ray Tuguigui

Art: Mingtian Du, Rui Fang, Rei Zhang

Sound: Erica Mitton
